title: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (e.g. 'foo.txt')
3. From the main menu, select File > Export and choose 'Zip File' to export
4.
OB: The zip file fails to store the files with the same name under different directories properly.
EB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, the files should be stored without any issues.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file named 'foo.txt'
3. From the main menu, select File > Export and choose 'Zip File' to export
4. Verify that the zip file does not store the files with the same name under different directories correctly.
